# MTLRenderPipelineReflection

**Class**

Information about the arguments of a graphics function.

## Declaration

```swift
class MTLRenderPipelineReflection
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderPipelineReflection] class is an interface that represents the parameters for the shaders in a render pipeline state (see [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRenderPipelineState]). Each pipeline state can include object, mesh, vertex, fragment, and tile shaders.

You create a reflection instance at the same time as the pipeline state that it represents by calling the appropriate [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] method. For example, the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/makeRenderPipelineState(descriptor:options:reflection:)] and [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/makeRenderPipelineState(descriptor:options:completionHandler:)-5gdww] methods create the pipeline state and the reflection instances at the same time.



For more information, see [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/pipeline-state-creation].

## Inspecting a shader’s parameter

- **fragmentBindings**: An array of binding instances, each of which represents a parameter of the pipeline state’s fragment shader.
- **meshBindings**: An array of binding instances, each of which represents a parameter of the pipeline state’s mesh shader.
- **objectBindings**: An array of binding instances, each of which represents a parameter of the pipeline state’s object shader.
- **tileBindings**: An array of binding instances, each of which represents a parameter of the pipeline state’s tile shader.
- **vertexBindings**: An array of binding instances, each of which represents a parameter of the pipeline state’s vertex shader.

## Deprecated

- **vertexArguments**: An array of argument instances, each of which represent a parameter of the pipeline state’s vertex shader.
- **fragmentArguments**: An array of argument instances, each of which represent a parameter of the pipeline state’s fragment shader.
- **tileArguments**: An array of argument instances, each of which represent a parameter of the pipeline state’s tile shader.

## Introspection data

- **MTLComputePipelineReflection**: Information about the arguments of a compute function.
- **MTLAutoreleasedComputePipelineReflection**: A convenience type alias for an autoreleased compute pipeline reflection object.
- **MTLAutoreleasedRenderPipelineReflection**: A convenience type alias for an autoreleased pipeline reflection instance.
